Interface IRelativeFileManager<T, TService>

Namespace
MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract
Assembly
MdFilesMerger.Controller.dll

Interface with additional methods for relative file models managers.

Inheritance: IManager<T, TService> -> ICRUDManager<T, TService> -> IRelativeFileManager<T, TService>
Implementations: RelativeFileManager<T, TService>, IgnoredFileManager, SelectedFileManager 

public interface IRelativeFileManager<T, TService> : ICRUDManager<T, TService>, IManager<T, TService> where T : RelativeFile where TService : RelativeFileService<T>

Type Parameters

T

Type of relative file model.

TService

Service handling collection of object of specified model.
